task.summary: Small Client-Server test with encryption over sockets
Can generate and load certificate, detecting errors when file corrupted
Cannot make the client and the server send messages to each other anymore
Can send encrypted strings from the client to the server. However we cannot send encrypted certificates
Generating session keys but failing to send it to the client (In fact any string larger than 64 bytes cannot be sent)
Can generate and send the symmetric key to the Server over sockets with RSA. However we might need to change the generation of the key a little bit
Irrelevant changes. Still no communication in simmetric key
Client also can ask for server's public key upon connection
Client should be able to handle session key changes

MESSAGE.value: Small Client-Server test with encryption over sockets
Can generate and load certificate, detecting errors when file corrupted
Cannot make the client and the server send messages to each other anymore
Can send encrypted strings from the client to the server. However we cannot send encrypted certificates
Generating session keys but failing to send it to the client (In fact any string larger than 64 bytes cannot be sent)
Can generate and send the symmetric key to the Server over sockets with RSA. However we might need to change the generation of the key a little bit
Irrelevant changes. Still no communication in simmetric key
Client also can ask for server's public key upon connection
Client should be able to handle session key changes
